Version 1.7.25 - Default Service, Role Badges, Auto-Enable for Managers, Manager Tokens API

Four enhancements to improve token management

1. Default Service Selection

When creating tokens (admin or batch), the "SmartMind - Estratoos Plugin" service is now pre-selected by default.

2. Role Column with Badges

The tokens management page now shows a "Role" column with colored badges:

  • Manager - Yellow badge
  • Teacher - Green badge
  • Student - Blue badge
  • Other - Gray badge

3. Auto-Enable Company for Managers

When creating tokens for IOMAD company managers (managertype > 0), the company is automatically enabled in the plugin access control. This ensures managers always have access to their company data.

4. New API Function: get_company_manager_tokens_status

New function to check if a company has manager tokens:

local_sm_estratoos_plugin_get_company_manager_tokens_status(companyid)

Returns: has_manager_tokens (bool), company info, and list of managers with tokens.
